title: Performance Feedback
description: Represents performance feedback data for a media buy or package

feedback_id.description: Unique identifier for this performance feedback submission

package_id.description: Specific package within the media buy (if feedback is package-specific)

creative_id.description: Specific creative asset (if feedback is creative-specific)

start.description: ISO 8601 start timestamp for measurement period

end.description: ISO 8601 end timestamp for measurement period

performance_index.description: Normalized performance score (0.0 = no value, 1.0 = expected, >1.0 = above expected)

status.description: Processing status of the performance feedback

submitted_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when feedback was submitted

applied_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when feedback was applied to optimization algorithms
